mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `bus` WHERE `id` in (SELECT `bus_id` FROM `running_through` WHERE `stop_id`=#{id});

SELECT `stop`.* FROM `stop` RIGHT JOIN (SELECT `stop_id`, `index` FROM `running_through` INNER JOIN `bus` ON `bus`.`id`=`running_through`.`bus_id` WHERE `bus`.`name`=#{name}) `bus_route` ON `stop`.`id`=`bus_route`.`stop_id` ORDER BY `index` ASC;
